questions.question: Whatâ€™s the current tech stack?
Do you have any preferences reagrding tech X?
Can we assume we go into custom development or you would like to continue with selected previously tech stack?
Will Webflow be a fit?
Will you provide assets?
Does current assets require additional changes?
Are there any dynamic elements on-page eg. service calculator?
Custom pages for each product or similar content for Products / Solution sections?
How many events during the year?
Does each event have its own page or user will be redirected for more information?
Could you tell us in more detail about the products itself that will be presented on a dedicated product pages?
Are there any more on-page functionalities/pages to be introduced than originally planned in the sitemap?
Who is gonna be responsible for adding/adjusting content?
Is there any content that must be migrated?
Are there any requirements regarding CMS?
Do you have any preferences towards tools/plugins?
Are there any payments/e-commerce functionalities?
Are there any 3rd party integrations we need to be aware of eg. Dynamic list of events, products fetched from e-commerce, CRMs?
Where do you store information from contact forms, CRM?
With which analytics tools we need to integrate?
Does the site need to be translated to different languages other than English?
Will you provide an SEO strategy or you would like us to take care of that?
Do you have any preferences or requirements regarding hosting?
Do you have a budget in mind for the website rebuild?
What is the timeline for the website rebuild?
Will you require any additional features such as a blog, newsletter sign-up, or social media integration?
Are there any specific design preferences or branding guidelines that need to be followed?
